app.name: WitNote
app.description: WitNote is a privacy-focused local note-taking app with built-in AI assistant to help you organize thoughts, polish articles, and answer questions. All data is stored locally, and AI models can run completely offline.

guide.description: WitNote is a privacy-focused local note-taking app with built-in AI assistant to help you organize thoughts, polish articles, and answer questions. All data is stored locally, and AI models can run completely offline.
guide.philosophySmartDesc: ‚Äî Dual AI engine: Main Ollama + Portable WebLLM
guide.philosophySimpleDesc: ‚Äî iOS-style card management, drag to organize
guide.philosophySecureDesc: ‚Äî 100% local storage, your thoughts belong only to you
guide.step1Desc: Choose a folder as your note library on first launch, all .txt and .md files will be shown automatically
guide.step2Desc: Click a card to edit, supports Markdown syntax and live preview
guide.step3Desc: The AI assistant on the right can read your current article and help you polish, summarize, or answer questions
guide.webllmDesc: Lightweight model running in browser, ready to use, suitable for simple conversations
